keyMoments.title: Break Into Laboratory
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hats successfully breach the laboratory facility to escape the Shinokuni gas.
keyMoments.significance: The crew takes action to escape Caesar's trap and continue their mission.

keyMoments.title: Alliance Cooperation
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hats work alongside Law and the G-5 Marines in an unusual pirate-marine alliance.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's ability to form strategic alliances when goals align.

keyMoments.title: Law Reveals Escape Plan
keyMoments.description: Law coordinates the alliance's escape through Building R-66.
keyMoments.significance: Law demonstrates strategic leadership in the pirate-marine alliance.

keyMoments.title: Seal Laboratory Breach
keyMoments.description: The G-5 Marines work desperately to seal the hole and prevent gas infiltration.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the loyalty and determination of the G-5 unit.

keyMoments.title: Alliance with Pirates
keyMoments.description: The G-5 Marines cooperate with the Straw Hats and Law to survive and protect the children.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates that the G-5 Marines prioritize saving innocents over traditional faction rivalry.
